mapper.select:
select * from t_fpj where yxbz = '1'
and djh = #{djh}

SELECT distinct a.djh, a.skpid, a.gfmc, a.jylssj, a.gsdm, a.jshj, CASE isnull(e.ppdm) WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT('Logo_',a.gsdm) ELSE CONCAT('Logo_',a.gsdm, '-', e.ppdm) END AS Logo, c.ztbz, c.ckbtgyy FROM t_jyls a RIGHT JOIN t_fpj b ON a.djh = b.djh LEFT JOIN t_ckhk c ON a.djh = c.djh JOIN t_skp d ON a.skpid = d.id LEFT JOIN t_pp e ON d.pid = e.id WHERE a.yxbz = '1' AND b.yxbz = '1' AND a.clztdm = '91'
and b.unionid = #{params.unionid}
and (a.gsdm in #{params.gsdm[${index}]} or a.gsdm is null)
a.jylssj>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
a.jylssj>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
a.jylssj < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
order by b.id desc
